content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Operation at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) with a drop position at (x=42.5, y=-83.5), a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0), and a Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) that connects the mining drill to a chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5) and another chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5).

### Coal Storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) that stores coal extracted from the mining operation.

### Coal Buffer at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5) that buffers coal from the mining operation.

### Coal Buffer at position(x=45.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=45.5, y=-80.5) that buffers coal from the mining operation.

### Coal Storage at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5) that stores coal from the mining operation.


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when the drill is out of fuel
- Ensure the drill has sufficient fuel to continue mining.
- Refuel the drill when it runs out of fuel.

### Errors when the chest at the drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.
- Ensure the chest has sufficient space to hold the extracted resources.

### Errors when the furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt.
- Provide the furnace with the required ingredients to continue smelting.

### Errors when there is no iron ore in the inventory
- Ensure there is sufficient iron ore in the inventory to meet the demands of the furnace.
- Mine or acquire more iron ore to replenish the inventory.

### Errors when the inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up.
- Provide the inserter with the necessary source items to continue operating.
